long_description: The Patagonia Down Sweater vest snuggles active girls in the cozy and incredibly light comfort of premium down while they walk to school or embark on outdoor adventures in cool weather. Mini ripstop polyester shell resists wear and tear; Durable Water Repellent finish shrugs off light snow and rain. Premium 600-fill-power European goose down offers ample warmth, light weight and compressibility. The Patagonia Down Sweater vest features comfortable quilted-through construction; shaped side panels create a feminine fit. Internal drawcord hem; full-zip front; windflap; zippered hand pockets; zippered internal pocket; reflective zipper pulls; ID label.
short_description: The Patagonia Down Sweater vest snuggles active girls in the cozy and incredibly light comfort of premium down while they walk to school or embark on outdoor adventures in cool weather.
subcategory: Rainwear And Outerwear -- Boys And Girls
